name: One Ways
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE.

When the way is upon your eyes. When the line is straight as the horizon line.

Scalable. That's one thing that we have been struggling in the past month. And this one is made by that fundamental. To create a game from scratch is really a different story from using a game engine that made for a specific genre.

The struggle when you just getting started is the real obstacle. We haven't had enough with this lesson. Let's learn to create more!

See ya on the next project!
